paper_abstract: In this paper a new kind of Choquet integral with respect to fuzzy measure on fuzzy sigma-algebra is introduced, and some elementary properties of this kind of Choquet integral are studied. Convergence theorems for sequences of Choquet integrals are shown. A transformation theorem is given, which reveals the relation between this kind of Choquet integral on fuzzy sets and the Choquet integral on classical crisp sets. Finally, a new set function defined by this kind of Choquet integral is discussed. This new set function preserves many structural characteristics of the original set function.
paper_title: Choquet integrals with respect to fuzzy measure on fuzzy sigma-algebra
